name: gitbook-plugin-folding-menu
description: GitBook plugin that tames large left-nav menus by visualizing one section at a time

animationDuration.description: The animation duration in mills ... use 0 (zero) to disable animation ... DEFAULT: 400

sticky.description: Leave the last section expanded when a the current active section has NO sub-content ... DEFAULT: false

author: Kevin J. Bridges <kevinast@gmail.com> (https://github.com/KevinAst)
